name: Tandem Dash
description:
Tandem Dash

How's your coordination?

Move your fingers in tandem to avoid obstacles, collect coins and beat increasingly challenging levels.

Features:

Simple and Fun Gameplay

Continuously Challenging Levels

New Skins to Unlock

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Controls:

Android

If you have chosen to play the game on Android:

Place your left finger first, then your right finger.

WebGL

If you have chosen to play the WebGL Version use the  "A" & "S" keys to control the left character and use the "Left Arrow" & "Right Arrow" to control the right character.

Tandem Dash Trailer
